Articles.Content: Can anyone give me some tips on how to build a successful ssto? I have tryed in the past but i run into certain fuel problems, (rip jeb) sometimes its oxidizer, other times its fuel in general. All tips are appreciated!

Just for clarification:

I assume you mean an SSTO spaceplane? I know there's somebody around here who's going to comment about SSTO rockets.

Building SSTOs is mostly about the challenge -- they aren't terribly practical. So if it's about the challenge, what are the rules for your SSTO? Cargo, crew, destination, etc.

But in general, the tips are always: reduce mass, reduce the part count, reduce drag (except at the back end), and increase the fuel load.
